subject: TopCoder Development Competitions
body:
Hello sm1lies,

Help shape the future of TopCoder by participating in 1 of 11 special competitions to help develop an internal time management system that will be used by TopCoder employees and members.

All members who participate in this competition will receive a $100.00 cash bonus simply by submitting a milestone - you do not have to be the 1st or 2nd prize winner in order to collect your bonus.

With a total of $16,500+ in prizes, the stakes are high and the competition will be fierce. Are you up for the challenge?

TimeTracker Competitions:

*         Admin User And Registration Phase II
*         Approval Phase II
*         Audit Phase II 
*         Entries and Billing Phase II
*         Invoice PDF Phase II 
*         Invoice Phase II 
*         Main Page Phase II 
*         My Account Config Phase II
*         Notification Phase II
*         Project And Client Phase II
*         Reporting Phase II

Check it out here: http://www.topcoder.com/tc?module=ViewActiveContests&ph=113

Happy Competing!

-TopCoder

===================================================================
You have received this email because you indicated in your TopCoder profile that you want to be notified of new TopCoder development opportunities.  If you no longer wish to receive these emails, login to www.topcoder.com/tc and click on 'Update My Profile'.  In the 'Email Notification' section of your TopCoder profile, you have the option to enable or disable receipt of various types of TopCoder emails.  Be sure to save any changes to your member profile.

www.topcoder.com

Glastonbury, CT 06033
